original_text: And as for you, command the priests who bear the ark of the covenant, ‘When you come to the brink of the waters of the Jordan, you shall stand still in the Jordan.’”
korean_text: 너는 언약궤를 멘 제사장들에게 명령하여 이르기를 너희가 요단 물 가에 이르거든 요단에 들어서라 하라

sentences.original_text: who bear the ark of the covenant,
‘When you come to the brink of the waters of the Jordan,
you shall stand still in the Jordan.’”
sentences.korean_translation: 너희는 요단 강 가운데 서 있으라.’”
